}

  float: left;
  margin: 0 0.2rem 0 0;
  padding: 0;
  counter-increment: number;
  content: counter(number);
  left: -2.2rem;
  top: 0.2rem;

  width: 1.6rem;
  height: 1.6rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
